title: "Epson puts additional funds into space robotics through start-up"
excerpt: "Japanese technology vendor Epson and its subsidiary Epson X will invest an unspecified amount in space robotics through a start-up known as GITAI. A statement from Epson on Tuesday described GITAI as a company that develops general-purpose space robots."
